landingSubHeader: Enhance your investment plans or make data-driven decisions with Libralytics' always fresh raw data of 100,000+ restaurants and delivery riders from all over Asia-Pacific.
dataHeader: Structured data in SQL or CSV
dataSubHeader: With Libralytics, get raw datasets collected from business-related public online platforms. With a convenient choice of either parsed JSON or CSV, we will transfer the data via a web link or send the files directly to your preferred storage.

dataQualities.body: Every month we update 158M high-value data points so you can always stay ahead of the competition.
With up to 30 months' worth of data development and scraping algorithms, our datasets can be confidently used to build models, forecast trends, assess competition.
Use Restaurant API, Rider API, and Weather API to access, filter and query our main datasets directly or request for on-demand scraping based on your needs.

dataUseCaseSubHeader: From startups to Fortune 500 companies, our business data is leveraged for a multitude of cases.
partnerHeader: We are proud to work with
stepsHeader: We like to keep it simple

steps.body: First, we discuss your specific needs. Optionally, we can offer a sample dataset. Then, you can either request the full dataset or data specific to selected countries and regions.
The requested data is then uploaded in CSV or JSON formats as a weblink or a file, directly to your preferred data storage.
Outdated data loses relevance. With Libralytics, get daily, monthly or quarterly data updates.

salesHeader: Not up for a sales call?
salesSubHeader: Sign up and get access to our interactive data catalog:
